numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I examined each graph.
2. The graphs list five sports.
3. I noticed that four of the five sports have diversified their players well.
4. I noticed that all five sports lack diversification in leadership positions.
5. Basketball is dominated by people of color.
6. In basketball, the number of head coaches of color is low.
7. Soccer has fewer players of color than basketball.
8. Soccer has 23% less players of color than basketball.
9. The percentage of head coaches of color in basketball is lower than the percentage of head coaches of color in soccer.
10. Football is dominated by people of color.
11. In football, few people of color are in leadership positions.
12. I wonder why football has few people of color in leadership positions.
13. I wonder why basketball has few people of color in leadership positions.
14. Baseball has a low number of players of color.
15. I wonder why baseball has a low number of players of color.
16. I live in New Hampshire.
17. New Hampshire is one of the whitest states in the country.
18. These statistics impact me and my community.
19. Highschool sports exist in New Hampshire.
20. College sports exist in New Hampshire.
21. I imagine that an exploration of these statistics for highschool sports in New Hampshire would show more profound results.
22. I imagine that an exploration of these statistics for college sports in New Hampshire would show more profound results.
23. The graphs show that people of color have a place in the player base.
24. The graphs show that work can be done among coaches.
25. The graphs provide possible insight into what these numbers could look like in New Hampshire.
26. The headline is: Leadership positions fall behind in diversity.
